description:
Sixteen year old Misako died before ever receiving her first kiss. Unable to move on to her next existence without resolving her past loves and regrets, she decides to haunt Mitsuru.
Her final wish is to possess Shinobu`s body and use it to kiss Mitsuru!
Her sobs are about a 7.0 on the Richter scale, luckily her range is fairly short.
name: Misako
